name: Space Aces (Guillermo_Ontiveros)
description:
Shooter 2D "SPACE ACES" based on Coursera Game

The following improvements has been added:

  1. Three levels with different difficulty
  2. New enemy base/missile spawner
  3. New ship sprites
  4. New sounds (main menu & game sound)
  5. New menu, frames, font,...
  6. New backgrounds, planets, asteroids,...
